metadata.dc:author: Rodríguez Luna, J M
Mayayo Dehesa, T
Fernańdez Fernández, A
metadata.dc:description: Ultrasound is currently the noninvasive imaging technique most commonly utilized in the clinical setting. It can be used in two ways: to obtain morphological data and to obtain dynamic information via the Doppler effect.
metadata.dc:title: Nuevas aplicaciones del efecto Doppler en urología.
[New applications of the Doppler effect in urology].
